cookie_consent.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

home.intro: Developer tools, financial calculators, and productivity boosters. All the utilities you need in one place.

word_counter.title: Word Counter
word_counter.description: Count words and characters in your text.
word_counter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...
word_counter.seo_content: This is a free online word counter tool. It helps you count words and characters for your essays, articles, and social media posts.

json_formatter.title: JSON Formatter
json_formatter.description: Format, validate, and minify your JSON data.
json_formatter.seo_content: Free online JSON Formatter and Validator. Beautify your JSON code, validate syntax, and minify for production.

lotto_generator.title: Lotto Number Generator
lotto_generator.description: Generate 6 lucky lotto numbers for free.
lotto_generator.seo_content: Free online lottery number generator. Randomly draw 6 numbers from 1 to 45 to test your luck. Save and manage your generated numbers.

server_time.title: Server Time Check
server_time.description: Check the exact server time of any website.
server_time.subtitle: Essential for ticketing and course registration where every second counts.
server_time.tip1: Works on the same principle as Navyism.
server_time.tip2: Calculates time based on the server's Date header information.
server_time.tip3: Minor deviations may occur due to network latency.
server_time.tip4: Watch the time flow in real-time without refreshing.
server_time.seo_content: Free online server time checker tool. Check the exact server time of Ticketmaster, StubHub, or any website down to 0.1 seconds. Essential tool for successful ticket purchases and course registration.

stock_average_calculator.title: Stock Average Down Calculator
stock_average_calculator.description: Calculate your new average price by entering your current holdings and additional purchases.
stock_average_calculator.seo_content: Free stock average down calculator. Calculate how much you can lower your average price by buying more shares. Essential tool for successful stock and crypto investing.

ticketing_practice.title: Ticketing Practice Game
ticketing_practice.description: Improve your click speed and accuracy with realistic ticketing practice.
ticketing_practice.share_message: Ticketing Practice Score: {score}! Can you beat me? üëâ
ticketing_practice.seo_content: Free ticketing practice game for Ticketmaster, StubHub, etc. Improve your reaction speed and click accuracy to secure the tickets you want.

salary_calculator.title: Real Salary Calculator (US)
salary_calculator.description: Calculate your estimated monthly take-home pay after Federal, State, and FICA taxes.
salary_calculator.seo_content: US Salary Calculator 2025. Estimate your paycheck after Federal Tax, Social Security, Medicare, and State Taxes.

image_to_base64.title: Image to Base64 Converter
image_to_base64.description: Convert image files to Base64 strings. Useful for embedding images directly into HTML or CSS.
image_to_base64.upload_label: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select

base64_to_image.title: Base64 Image Decoder
base64_to_image.description: Convert Base64 strings back to image files. Preview and download the result.

compound_interest.title: Compound Interest Calculator
compound_interest.description: Calculate the future value of your investment with monthly contributions.
compound_interest.subtitle: See how your money grows over time with the power of compound interest.
compound_interest.seo_content: Free online compound interest calculator. Visualize your investment growth with monthly contributions. Essential tool for financial planning and retirement strategy.

uuid_generator.title: UUID Generator
uuid_generator.description: Generate and copy secure, unique UUID v4 strings in bulk.
uuid_generator.subtitle: Bulk UUID generation tool for developers
uuid_generator.seo_content: Free online UUID v4 generator. Generate multiple secure UUIDs at once for database keys or unique identifiers. Generated locally in your browser for security.

unit_converter.title: Unit Converter
unit_converter.description: Convert various units such as length, weight, volume, area, and temperature quickly and easily.
unit_converter.seo_content: Free online unit converter. Convert meters, inches, feet, kilograms, pounds, Celsius, Fahrenheit, and more for daily life and work.

jwt_decoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwt_decoder.description: Decode JWTs instantly in your browser. No server-side processing for your security.
jwt_decoder.privacy_alert: Your token is decoded locally in your browser and never sent to any server.
jwt_decoder.seo_content: Free online JWT Decoder. View the Header and Payload of your JSON Web Token (JWT) instantly. All processing is done client-side for your security.

unix_timestamp.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix_timestamp.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa.
unix_timestamp.seo_content: Free online Unix Timestamp Converter. Convert Epoch time to human-readable dates or dates to Unix timestamps. Check real-time current Unix time.

cron_generator.title: Cron Expression Generator
cron_generator.description: Generate complex Cron schedules easily with a few clicks.
cron_generator.seo_content: Free online Cron Expression Generator. Create Linux Crontab schedules easily with a GUI and get human-readable descriptions. Set up recurring tasks for minutes, hours, days, weeks, and months.

roi_calculator.title: ROI Calculator
roi_calculator.description: Calculate your Return on Investment (ROI) and annualized ROI.
roi_calculator.seo_content: Free online ROI Calculator. Calculate your Return on Investment percentage, Total Profit, and Annualized ROI (CAGR) instantly. Useful for analyzing stocks, real estate, and business investments.

youtube_calculator.title: YouTube Earnings Calculator
youtube_calculator.description: Estimate your daily, monthly, and yearly potential earnings on YouTube.
youtube_calculator.disclaimer: Estimates only. Actual earnings vary by niche and country.
youtube_calculator.seo_content: Free online YouTube Estimated Earnings Calculator. Estimate your potential daily, monthly, and yearly revenue based on daily views and RPM. Essential tool for YouTubers and creators.

pomodoro_timer.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro_timer.description: Boost productivity with the Pomodoro Technique. 25 min focus, 5 min break.
pomodoro_timer.seo_content: Free online Pomodoro Timer. Boost your focus and productivity with the 25-minute work and 5-minute break cycle. Optimized for study, work, and coding.

password_generator.title: Password Generator
password_generator.seo_content: Free online strong password generator. Create secure, unhackable passwords with customizable length and character options. Works entirely client-side for safety.

qr_code.title: QR Code Generator
qr_code.description: Convert URLs, text, emails, and more into QR codes and download them.
qr_code.seo_content: Free online QR Code Generator. Convert website links, text, and contact info into QR codes and download as PNG images. Customize colors and size freely.

sql_formatter.title: SQL Formatter
sql_formatter.description: Format and beautify your SQL queries with syntax highlighting.
sql_formatter.seo_content: Free online SQL Formatter and Beautifier. Format complex SQL queries instantly. Supports Standard SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and more. Improve your code readability.

percentage_calculator.title: Percentage Calculator
percentage_calculator.description: Perform various percentage calculations quickly and easily.
percentage_calculator.seo_content: Free online percentage calculator. Calculate percentage of a value, percentage change, and percentage increase/decrease easily. Useful for discounts, tips, and financial calculations.

diff_checker.title: Diff Checker
diff_checker.description: Compare two texts and visualize the differences.
diff_checker.seo_content: Free online Diff Checker. Compare two text files or code snippets to find differences. Visualize added and removed lines easily. Useful for code review and document comparison.

d_day_counter.title: D-Day Counter
d_day_counter.description: Calculate days remaining or passed for anniversaries, exams, and events.
d_day_counter.seo_content: Free online D-Day Counter. Calculate days remaining for events or days passed since a date. Perfect for anniversaries, countdowns, and tracking important milestones.

bmi_calculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmi_calculator.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on height and weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_underweight: You are underweight. It's important to eat a balanced diet and consult a healthcare provider to reach a healthy weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_normal: Great job! You have a healthy weight. Maintain your balanced diet and regular exercise to stay healthy.
bmi_calculator.tip_overweight: You are slightly overweight. Consider a balanced diet and regular physical activity to manage your weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_obese: You are in the obese range. It is recommended to consult a healthcare provider for a personalized weight management plan.
bmi_calculator.tip_severe_obese: You are in the severely obese range. Please consult a healthcare provider for immediate medical advice and support.
bmi_calculator.seo_content: Free online BMI Calculator. Enter your height and weight to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and check your weight status. Essential tool for health management.

vat_calculator.title: VAT Calculator
vat_calculator.description: Calculate VAT (Value Added Tax) and total amount easily. Supports both tax-exclusive and tax-inclusive calculations.
vat_calculator.seo_content: Free online VAT Calculator. Calculate Value Added Tax (VAT) quickly and accurately. Supports adding tax to net amount or extracting tax from gross amount. Customizable tax rates for all countries.

aspect_ratio_calculator.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
aspect_ratio_calculator.description: Calculate dimensions based on aspect ratio. Useful for designers, developers, and video editors.
aspect_ratio_calculator.seo_content: Free online Aspect Ratio Calculator. Calculate width or height based on 16:9, 4:3, 21:9 and other common aspect ratios. Essential tool for responsive design and video editing.

country_capital_quiz.title: Country Capital Quiz
country_capital_quiz.description: Explore countries and capitals of the world. Test your knowledge with a fun quiz!
country_capital_quiz.seo_content: Free online Country Capital Quiz and Finder. Search for capitals of countries around the world or test your geography knowledge with an interactive quiz. Learn flags, capitals, and regions.

random_wheel.title: Random Wheel Picker
random_wheel.description: Spin the wheel to pick a random item. Great for decisions, raffles, and games.
random_wheel.seo_content: Free online Random Wheel Picker. Make decisions fun and fair by spinning the wheel. Perfect for picking lunch, raffle winners, or assigning tasks randomly.

image_resizer.title: Image Converter & Resizer
image_resizer.description: Resize images and convert them to JPG, PNG, or WebP formats.
image_resizer.drop_zone: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select
image_resizer.seo_content: Free online Image Converter & Resizer. Resize images and convert formats (JPG, PNG, WebP) easily. No software installation required, works directly in your browser.

lorem_ipsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem_ipsum.description: Generate dummy text (Lorem Ipsum) for design and development.
lorem_ipsum.seo_content: Free online Lorem Ipsum Generator. Generate dummy text for website design, publishing, and graphic design. Create paragraphs, sentences, or words of standard Lorem Ipsum text.

image_cropper.title: Image Cropper
image_cropper.description: Crop images to specific aspect ratios (1:1, 16:9, etc.) or custom dimensions.
image_cropper.drop_zone: Drop image here or click to upload
image_cropper.seo_content: Crop your images online for free. Support for various aspect ratios like 1:1 for Instagram, 16:9 for YouTube, and custom cropping. No upload to server required.

exif_viewer.title: EXIF Data Viewer
exif_viewer.description: View hidden metadata (EXIF) in your photos, including camera settings, location, and date taken.
exif_viewer.drop_zone: Drop image here or click to upload
exif_viewer.drop_zone_sub: Supports JPG, PNG, HEIC, TIFF, WebP
exif_viewer.privacy_note: All processing happens in your browser. Your photos are never uploaded to any server.
exif_viewer.seo_content: Free online EXIF viewer tool. Check hidden metadata in your photos such as camera model, ISO, aperture, shutter speed, and GPS location. Supports JPG, HEIC, PNG formats. Client-side processing ensures your privacy.

image_filters.title: Image Filters
image_filters.description: Apply various filters and effects to your images.
image_filters.drop_zone: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select
image_filters.seo_content: Free online Image Filters tool. Apply filters like Grayscale, Sepia, Blur and adjust brightness, contrast, saturation. Enhance your photos directly in the browser.

case_converter.title: Text Case Converter
case_converter.description: Convert text to Uppercase, Lowercase, Camel Case, and more.
case_converter.seo_content: Free online Text Case Converter. Instantly convert text to Uppercase, Lowercase, Title Case, Sentence Case, Camel Case, Snake Case, and more. Essential tool for writers and developers.

html_encoder.title: HTML Encoder/Decoder
html_encoder.description: Encode or decode special characters to HTML entities.
html_encoder.seo_content: Free online HTML Encoder/Decoder. Convert special characters (<, >, &, ", etc.) to HTML entity codes or decode entities back to text. Essential tool for web developers and content creators.

image_to_pdf.title: Image to PDF
image_to_pdf.description: Convert multiple images into a single PDF file.
image_to_pdf.drop_zone: Drag & drop images here, or click to select
image_to_pdf.seo_content: Free online Image to PDF converter. Easily convert multiple JPG, PNG images into a single PDF document. No software installation required, works directly in your browser.

image_blur.title: Image Blur/Mosaic
image_blur.description: Select specific areas of an image to apply blur or mosaic effect.
image_blur.drop_zone: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select
image_blur.seo_content: Free online Image Blur and Mosaic tool. Easily blur or pixelate specific areas of your photos to hide faces, sensitive information, or for artistic effect.

merge_pdf.title: Merge PDF
merge_pdf.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single file.
merge_pdf.drop_zone: Drag and drop PDF files here, or click to select
merge_pdf.seo_content: Free online PDF merger tool. Combine multiple PDF files into one document in the order you want. Fast, secure, and no installation required.

split_pdf.title: Split PDF
split_pdf.description: Extract specific pages from a PDF file.
split_pdf.drop_zone: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to select
split_pdf.seo_content: Free online PDF splitter tool. Extract specific pages or split all pages into separate files. Fast, secure, and no installation required.

reaction_time.title: Reaction Time Test
reaction_time.description: Test your reflexes. Click when the screen turns green!
reaction_time.seo_content: Free online reaction time test. Measure your visual reflex speed in milliseconds and check your average score. Compete with friends!

loan_calculator.title: Loan Calculator
loan_calculator.description: Calculate monthly payments and total interest for different repayment methods: Equal Principal & Interest, Equal Principal, and Maturity.
loan_calculator.seo_content: Planning a loan? Calculate your monthly payments and total interest for various repayment methods. Make informed financial decisions with our free loan calculator.

bmr_calculator.title: BMR Calculator
bmr_calculator.description: Start your diet journey! Calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE).
bmr_calculator.result_tdee_desc: Calories needed per day to maintain current weight.
bmr_calculator.seo_content: Knowing your BMR is crucial for successful weight loss. We use the Mifflin-St Jeor equation to provide the most accurate BMR and TDEE calculations.

image_converter.title: Image Converter
image_converter.description: Convert images to JPG, PNG, WEBP, and more.
image_converter.drop_zone: Drag & drop or click to upload images
image_converter.seo_content: Free online image converter. Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC formats. Converts safely on the client side without server upload.

image_compressor.title: Image Compressor
image_compressor.description: Compress images without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP formats with adjustable compression levels.
image_compressor.drop_zone_sub: or click to select files (JPG, PNG, WEBP)
image_compressor.seo_content: Free online image compressor. Reduce file size of JPG, PNG, WEBP images without quality loss. Processed safely in your browser.

tdee_calculator.title: TDEE & Macro Calculator
tdee_calculator.description: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure and macronutrient needs.
tdee_calculator.seo_content: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) and macronutrient split for weight loss, maintenance, or muscle gain. Based on the Mifflin-St Jeor equation.

privacy.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy.data_collection_content: We do not collect any personal data that can identify you directly. However, we may collect non-personal data such as browser type, operating system, and IP address for analytics purposes to improve our service.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies.
privacy.adsense_content_1: We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to you based on your visit to our sites and/or other sites on the Internet.
privacy.adsense_content_2: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings.
privacy.security_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. For tools like our "Word Counter", all processing happens in your browser. Your text data is never sent to our servers.
privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at: support@cheetset.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions.
terms.usage_content: You must use our services for lawful purposes only. Our tools are provided 'as is' without any warranties.
terms.disclaimer_content: Cheetset does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the service. In particular, results from financial tools (Salary Calculator, Compound Interest Calculator, etc.) should be used for reference only.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@cheetset.com
